2.1.2 Sellar, Brian. (2016). Metocean Data Set from the ReDAPT Tidal Project: Batch 1, Part 1, 2011-2014 [dataset]. University of Edinburgh. School of Engineering. http://datashare.is.ed.ac.uk/handle/10283/2329
